title: Final Year Project: Voice-Based Restaurant Order Assistant
description: Voice recognition system powered by LLMs that allows interaction with a virtual assistant for placing and managing restaurant orders. Once the chatbot records the entire order, it sends the order to a React web server for processing..

title: ID Document Information Recognizer
description: A Python app that uses Tesseract OCR to extract key information from French and UK ID documents.

title: ANIMALSHELTER Project
description: A web platform that uses web scraping to centralize data from various animal shelters, making it easier to find and adopt animals.

title: Neural Network Projects
description: A collection of 5 beginner to intermediate neural network projects for practicing various concepts, including dense layers, CNNs, data augmentation, dropout, and transfer learning.

title: Goku's Escape
description: A mini-game created with Pygame where you control Goku, dodging incoming rockets to achieve a high score.

title: React Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio built with ReactJS to showcase projects and skills.
